tatami.core.agent.parametric

Class ParametricComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.agent.AgentComponent
      • tatami.core.agent.parametric.ParametricComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ParametricComponent
extends AgentComponent
    This basic component of the agent handles agent parameters.

    It contains the list of agent's parameters and implements methods for retrieving parameters.

    The class is underpinned by an AgentParameters instance.

    Access to 'registered' parameters (specified in AgentParameterName) can be only be done per-name. 'Unregistered' parameters can also be retrieved in bulk.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • parVal

        public final java.lang.String parVal(AgentParameterName name)
        Retrieves a value associated with the name (it may not be the only one). An exception may be thrown if the first found value is not a String instance.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the searched entry.
        Returns:
        the first found value associated with the name.

      • parVals

        public final java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> parVals(AgentParameterName name)
        Retrieves all value associated with the name. An exception may be thrown if any value is not a String instance.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the searched entry(ies).
        Returns:
        a Collection of values associated with the name.

      • parObj

        public final java.lang.Object parObj(AgentParameterName name)
        Retrieves a value associated with the name (it may not be the only one).
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the searched entry.
        Returns:
        the first found value associated with the name, as an Object instance.

      • hasPar

        public final boolean hasPar(AgentParameterName name)
        Indicates whether a parameter with the specified name has been set.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the searched entry.
        Returns:
        true if any entry exists with the specified name.

      • getUnregisteredParameters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getUnregisteredParameters()
        Retrieves a Map with the 'unregistered' parameters - those parameters whose name does not correspond to a AgentParameterName instance.
        Returns:
        the map of entries. Multiple entries with the same name will be ignored.
